modName: UFO - Hearthfire housecarls fix --no longer necessary--
summary:
these additional scripts fix the recruit/dismiss mechanic for the hearthfire expansion housecarls in the famous UFO mod.
-------------> UFO mod now includes this fix. <-----------------
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=6][color=red]Attention[/color][/size][/b]
[b][size=5][color=orange]UFO mod now has been updated. this mod is no longer necessary[/color][/size][/b][/center]


[b][center][size=6][color=lightblue]Description[/color][/size][/center][/b]

[b][size=3]these scripts add the hearthfire housecarls into the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO[/url] mod recruit/dismiss system.

it should be noted that hearthfire housecarls all have their own unique recruit/dismissal dialogue lines and fixing it requires modification of the UFO\\\'s main .esp file and that requires permission. so this fix makes them speak the default housecarl recruit/dismissal lines.

[b][center][size=6][color=lightblue]Installation[/color][/size][/center][/b]
[b][size=3]Download with NMM or manually copy the .pex files into your \"data\\scripts\" folder[/size][/b]
[b][size=4][color=red]Note:[/color][/size][/b] [b][size=3]you have to have the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO[/url] mod installed already[/size][/b]

[b][center][size=4][color=orange]Note that this mod is temporary until [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO[/url] author, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1265248]fLokii[/url] comes up with his own complete fix[/color][/size][/center][/b]
author: navida1
